scripts.prisma:generate: pnpm run prisma:generate:shared && pnpm run prisma:generate:entitlement && pnpm run prisma:generate:assets && pnpm run prisma:generate:work
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: pnpm run db:init && pnpm run prisma:migrate:dev:all
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev:all: pnpm run prisma:migrate:dev:shared && pnpm run prisma:migrate:dev:entitlement && pnpm run prisma:migrate:dev:assets && pnpm run prisma:migrate:dev:work
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev:shared: cd packages/shared-kernel && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev:entitlement: cd packages/entitlement-service && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev:assets: cd packages/assets-module && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev:work: cd packages/work-module && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy: pnpm run prisma:migrate:deploy:shared && pnpm run prisma:migrate:deploy:entitlement && pnpm run prisma:migrate:deploy:assets && pnpm run prisma:migrate:deploy:work
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy:shared: cd packages/shared-kernel && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy:entitlement: cd packages/entitlement-service && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy:assets: cd packages/assets-module && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy:work: cd packages/work-module && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: pnpm run db:seed:shared && pnpm run db:seed:entitlement && pnpm run db:seed:assets && pnpm run db:seed:work
scripts.db:seed:shared: cd packages/shared-kernel && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:seed:entitlement: cd packages/entitlement-service && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:seed:assets: cd packages/assets-module && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:seed:work: cd packages/work-module && npx prisma db seed
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm docker:db:up" "pnpm nx serve api-gateway" "pnpm nx dev web"
scripts.dev:setup: pnpm install && pnpm docker:db:up && sleep 5 && pnpm prisma:generate && pnpm prisma:migrate:dev
